mapper.select: select comment_no, name, comment, comment_time, qnaid from comments where qnaid = #{qnaid} order by comment_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into comments(name, comment, comment_time, qnaid) values (#{name}, #{comment}, #{comment_time}, #{qnaid})
mapper.update: update comments set comment = #{comment} where comment_no = #{comment_no}
